column5: We are centrally located between Houston & Galveston. Also included is a fishing trip with my husband (certified fishing guide- $600 value) or just a boat ride to dinner!  Reliant Stadium - 25 minutes Galveston - 40 minutes Galleria - 35 minutes Baybrook Mall - 10 minutes Kemah Boardwalk - 25 minutes Nasa - 15 minutes  Guests will have the upstairs to themselves. There are 3 bedrooms - 1 full bed, 1 pull out couch, a full bath and a game room. We also have a space outside to hang out/BBQ!
column8: Central Location- Guided Fishing Trip Included!!!
